name: Inviolable
description:
Inviolable is a fast paced top-down shooting/fighting game.
Read your opponent's moves and counter them with quick reflexes!

Features:
-Fast paced and skill testing combat.
-Smooth and stunning visual.
-Three diverse weapons with distinct characteristics.
-Electrifying soundtrack.
-Singleplayer (against AI with three difficulties) and Multiplayer (local and online). (Online matchmaking is currently in beta.)
-Supports both keyboard and game controller.


Controls:
-WASD (arrow keys for second player or left stick for controller) to move.
-Space (right control for second player or A on controller) while moving to dash.
-J (left mouse key for second player or X on controller) to fire machine gun.
-K (right mouse key for second player or RB on controller) to fire laser.
-L (middle mouse key for second player or LB on controller) to fire shotgun.

Credits:
Programming/design/soundtrack/sound design by Nanxing Li (Sageo Games).

Quick note:
Inviolable is my first project. It is a combat prototype with which I could attempt bringing to life the fast paced combat system I've been thinking of for a long time.
I'll keep polishing this in the future.
